art_style_description:
STYLE:
Use the provided example_images as a direct visual reference for the art style. Heavy black outlines around the entire character. Smooth, clean color fills. Clean gradients that emphasize volume.

SHADING:
Use heavy shading and large highlight shapes.

COLOR:
Image composed of medium saturated colors.

NEGATIVE PROMPT:
realism, detail, film lighting, grain, painterly strokes, noise, soft pastel look, watercolor effects, 3D rendering, photographic detail, atmospheric colored lighting, rim lighting, muted or desaturated colors, neon colors, toy-like hues, white border, color swatches, white background, text, empty background space
